dc:title: Help Wanted
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Overflowing with the destitute and broke, she implores St. Joseph to move readers to help. Praises the work with the poor of The Little Brothers of Jesus.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 665 1954-04-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
